meals.name: Char Koay Teow
meals.desc: Charcoal-flamed, with prawn, with wok hei

meals.name: Koay Teow Th'ng
meals.desc: Flat rice noodles served with a clear savoury broth and a host of chicken or duck meat, fishballs and vegetables.

meals.name: Hokkien Mee
meals.desc: With egg, kangkung (water spinach), bean spouts, fried shallots and the special sambal

meals.name: Kway Chap
meals.desc: With dark soy sauce, served with an assortment of pork cuts including offal, pork belly, intestines, pig's ears, braised duck.

meals.name: Assam Laksa
meals.desc: Well-balanced flavours of sweet, spicy, and sour

meals.name: Ais Kacang
meals.desc: With sweet corn, red beans, palm sugar syrup and a scoop of ice cream.

meals.name: Char Koay Kak
meals.desc: With dark soy sauce, chopped chai poh, and bean sprouts.

meals.name: Holiday Deals
meals.desc: Mix of various Penang cuisines (5 yum dishes).
